title: Two 12-year-olds arrested for murder of 15-year-old
content:
WINSTON-SALEM, N.C. —
Two twelve-year-olds have been arrested in connection to the shooting of a 15-year-old boy who was found dead Sunday, Winston-Salem police said.
Police released no further information about the two because they are juveniles. However, police said Sunday that Mendoza knew the shooter and they were looking for two Hispanic males between the ages of 12 and 16.
Jose Angel Chegue Mendoza was found with gunshot wounds in an open area behind a church near 432 Crews St. He was taken to Baptist Medical Center, where he died.
No other suspects are being sought.
Anyone with information about the shooting is asked to call police at 336-773-7700 or CrimeStoppers at 336-727-2800 (en Español: 336-728-3904).
The shooting was the 16th homicide in Winston-Salem this year, compared to eight during the same time frame in 2015, police said.
